title.rendered: 30 Best 5 Star Hotels near me in  Gaya Bihar

content.rendered:
When it comes to a luxury experience, Gaya Bihar has to be the perfect destination. Known for its mouth-watering street food, culturally rich heritage sites, and vibrant atmosphere, the national capital offers an unforgettable experience to everyone. The grandeur of Gaya Bihar is further amplified by its incredible collection of phenomenal 5-star hotels. If it is the luxurious experience you are looking for, with a hospitable staff, a relaxing environment, and a wholesome royal experience then head on to Gaya Bihar. The lavish lawns, elegant interiors, and high-end restaurants teamed up with a welcoming vibe may just be the thing that you need to hit that refresh button and feel rejuvenated inside out. These hotels are ideal for not just staying during vacations but also hosting wedding ceremonies and other such important events. What better way of making an impression? Check out these 30 best 5-star hotels near me in Gaya Bihar and experience Gaya Bihar like never before.

List of the 30 Best 5 Star Hotels near me in Gaya Bihar

1. The Leela Palace


Ever since its opening in 1986, The Leela Palace has been redefining the unparalleled luxury experience. Headquartered in Mumbai, the Leela is a much-loved 5-star hotel in Gaya Bihar along with many other flagship branches panning across the subcontinent. The Leela is all about representing the unique culture, art, and cuisine through its stylish interiors as well as cuisines. Offering a rich immersive experience it has won several awards for its incredible services including the world’s best hotel. This 5-star hotel in Gaya Bihar is committed to providing unforgettable stays to every guest.

Cost: Rs. 22,420/-

Address: Africa Ave, Diplomatic Enclave, Chanakyapuri, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110023

Google Rating: 4.6

2. The Oberoi


The very first chapter of the Oberoi can be traced back to as early as 1934 in Shimla. The founder had the vision of opening a luxurious hospitality experience. Over generations now, The Oberoi has stood tall as one of the most iconic, celebrated, and well-established 5-star hotels in Gaya Bihar along with the rest of India and the world. Every property is curated towards providing a luxury getaway experience. From the rooms to the restaurants and services, everything is truly exceptional.

Cost: Rs. 28,025/-

Address: Dr Zakir Hussain Marg, Gaya Bihar Golf Club, Golf Links, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110003

Google Rating: 4.7

3. Taj Mahal


Holding a distinguished place among one of the most royal 5-star hotels in the national capital, the Taj Mahal Hotel in New Gaya Bihar is a masterpiece. Lovingly referred to as the capital’s palace since 1983, the hotel covers a lush area of over 6 acres complete with neatly trimmed and well-maintained lawns, timeless architectural beauty, and incredible hospitality that will make you keep going back for more. The New Gaya Bihar Taj Mahal Hotel offers incredible views of the surrounding Gaya Bihar greenery and natural beauty at its best. All this teamed up with rich cultural Indian art, warmth, and personalized services makes this iconic hotel truly a one-of-a-kind experience.

Cost: Rs. 21,240/-

Address: Number One, Maan Singh Rd, Man Singh Road Area, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110011

Google Rating: 4.6

4. Lemon Tree Premier


Situated conveniently 4 kms away from the Indira Gandhi International Airport in Aerocity, Lemon Tree is all about giving its guests a plush experience. This luxurious stay comes with a wonderfully relaxing swimming pool, spa massage experience, and many other such interesting amenities primarily geared toward providing every guest with a rejuvenating experience. Don’t miss out on your day of working out in the well-equipped gym that also comes with a personal trainer.

Cost: Rs. 13,756/-

Address: Indira Gandhi International Airport, Asset No. 6, Aerocity Hospitality District, 6, Northern Access Rd, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.2

5. Holiday Inn


Located just a couple of minutes away from the international airport of Gaya Bihar, this top-notch 5-star hotel in Gaya Bihar deserves some much-needed attention. With Holiday Inn, it’s not just about the hotel and stay it’s about having a wholesome and deeply immersive experience. Guests can enjoy shopping at the nearby malls of DLF promenade or ambiance or even go on a complete Gaya Bihar Darshan. All you have to do is connect to their travel desk and you are good to go.

Cost: Rs. 6,243/-

Address: District Centre, 13A, Mayur Vihar, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110091

Google Rating: 4.4

6. Andaz


Andaz is a popular concept hotel by Hyatt focussed on offering a rich and royal stay experience. The unique art pieces installed in the hotel create an immersive travel experience that will make you fall in love with the city. Studded with an incredible pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and a spa therapy center, a stay at Andaz will leave a lasting impression for sure. Make sure to book the airport-facing window room, if you can, for the best stay experience.

Cost: Rs. 14,750/-

Address: Gate No. 1, Asset No.1, Hospitality District Gaya Bihar, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.5

7. The Leela Ambience


Been a while since you treated yourself? This is your sign to book a room at the Leela ambiance and enjoy a day full of self-love and care. The hotel is an award-winning property designed solely to offer a wonderful holiday experience, no matter where you are coming from. The first chapter of the Leela Ambiance was written in 1986 and ever since then, it has dominated the luxury 5-star hotel category in India and the world. The captivating environs wrapped with the sweet welcoming arms of Indian hospitality make a stay here well worth it.

Cost: Rs. 10,029/-

Address: 1, CBD, Maharaja Surajmal Marg, near YAMUNA SPORTS COMPLEX, Vishwas Nagar Extension, Vishwas Nagar, Shahdara, Gaya Bihar, 110032

Google Rating: 4.5

8. JW Marriott


When it comes to bespoke 5-star hotels in Gaya Bihar, JW Marriott’s name comes first to mind. Situated very close to the DLF promenade, in the Gaya Bihar Aerocity area, the hotel boasts incredible amenities and top-notch services. The spa center deserves special mention for its international standards of spa treatment experience. The perfect hotel where you can relax your day away while feeling your stress melt too. The on-site international cuisine restaurant along with professional yoga makes for a well-rounded stay experience.

Cost: Rs. 18,584/-

Address: Asset Area 4 – Hospitality District Gaya Bihar, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.6

9. Crowne Plaza


The heart of Gaya Bihar is the location for this iconic 5-star hotel. Overlooking the well-preserved green ridge area of Gaya Bihar. Featuring an award-winning spa and a 24-hour open fitness center, a relaxing vacation in Gaya Bihar is guaranteed. Its nearness to the local heritage attractions of Red Fort, Tughlakabad Fort, etc. makes it a sought-after hotel among travel enthusiasts. The rooms of Crowne Plaza deserve a special mention for being soundproofed and representing a combination of modern and contemporary looks. The hotel offers round-the-clock room service along with top-notch international restaurants serving delectable cuisine selections.

Cost: Rs. 9,805/-

Address: District Centre, 13 B, Mayur Vihar, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110091

Google Rating: 4.4

10. The Imperial


The imperial New Gaya Bihar is all about reminiscing and recreating the 19th-century royal vibe. Opened in 1936, stepping into the hotel will take you to the era of Marajas and maharanis. The architecture is focused on showcasing traces of Victorian, Art Deco, and typical Lutyens style. One does not simply stay at the imperial, they have a whole world of experience. The antique chandeliers and rosewood furniture leave no stone unturned in creating a magical atmosphere of royal wonderment at its best. Blending modern-day comforts with exceptional services makes imperial Gaya Bihar the ideal destination for business as well as leisure travelers.

Cost: Rs. 31,541/-

Address: Janpath Ln, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001

Google Rating: 4.7

11. Vivanta


Vivanta by Taj in New Gaya Bihar is designed to create a wonderful stay experience. Situated in the serene and quiet suburbs of Dwarka, this 5-star hotel offers an incredibly laid-back environment complete with elegant interiors, well-spoken and welcoming staff, and spacious rooms. The restaurants and cafes here are created to offer delectable international cuisines from across the globe right on your plate. Considered one of the best wedding venues in Gaya Bihar, Vivanta boasts several such awesome amenities that come in handy to visitors.

Cost: Rs. 8,400/-

Address: Service Rd, Sector 21, Dwarka, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar, 110075

Google Rating: 4.4

12. Pullman


Pullman Gaya Bihar is all about happy vibes and good times. Located very close to the Indira Gandhi International Airport in Aerocity, Pullman Hotel is within driving distance of the hubs of both Gurgaon as well as New Gaya Bihar. Rooms in Pullman are spacious, welcoming, and warm while also showcasing modern contemporary interior styles. Some of the suites also offer stunningly scenic views of the airport runway adding an exciting touch to the stay experience. All this teamed with amenities such as complimentary WIFI and an extensive selection of award-winning restaurants and cafes makes Pullman a real crowd-puller.

Cost: Rs. 21,830/-

Address: Asset No 02, Gmr Hospitality District, IGI Rd, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.6

13. Radisson Blu Plaza


Radisson is one 5-star hotel that needs no introduction. Situated just 5 minutes away from the Gaya Bihar International Airport, its connectivity to various hubs in and around the city makes it the first choice among travelers. The hotel leaves no stone unturned in ensuring safety, hygiene, and overall a great staycation for every guest walking in. When it comes to the range and quality of foods in Radisson restaurants, there is no competition. The staff offers an incredibly welcoming atmosphere while catering to every one of your needs.

Cost: Rs. 13,395/-

Address: Nh 8, near Mahipalpur Extension, Block R, Mahipalpur Village, Mahipalpur, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.6

14. Aloft


If it is a modern space with a touch of eclectic vibe you are looking for, then head on to Aloft in Aerocity. The hotel represents the modern-day lifestyle of work, play, and relaxation at its best. The interiors are vibrant and colourful which will put you in a happy spirit from the moment you walk in. Guests can indulge in a top-notch dine-in experience at one of the many restaurants or check out the weekly live music sessions that help unwind and get a taste of some of the finest drinks at the finest bar.

Cost: Rs. 8,800/-

Address: 5B, IGI T3 Road, Aerocity, Gaya Bihar Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.4

15. Hyatt Regency


Looking to stay in style? Hyatt Regency is just the place for you. Established in 1957, the primary goal of the hotel has always been to provide a memorable stay for everyone. Find peace away from the bustle of the national capital in the Hyatt Regency. This 5-star hotel redefines a luxurious stay. Enjoy the award-winning dining experience, innovative spa and salon service, state-of-the-art fitness center, and more incredible amenities. The exceptional hospitality and convenient connectivity to the rest of the city will be the icing on the cake.

Cost: Rs. 14,249/-

Address: Ring Rd, Bhikaji Cama Place, Rama Krishna Puram, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110066

Google Rating: 4.5

16. The Lodhi


The Lodhi Gaya Bihar is an urban oasis in the middle of the bustling city of Gaya Bihar. From the moment you walk into the Lodhi, the incredible interiors and contemporary design styles will immediately catch your attention. This place is all about representing the culture, wellness, architecture, and lifestyle at its best. Situated very close to the iconic heritage site of the Lodi Garden, this 5-star hotel boasts a world-class spa, lap pool, tennis court, fitness centers, and more. What makes it better is the well-curated selection of cafes and restaurants.

Cost: Rs. 23,364/-

Address: Lodhi Rd, CGO Complex, Pragati Vihar, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110003

Google Rating: 4.6

17. Crowne Plaza Okhla


The Crowne Plaza New Gaya Bihar is situated 21 kms away from the international and domestic airports in the heart of the corporate and industrial hub of Gaya Bihar. Along with a memorable comfortable stay, the hotel also offers completely integrated hospitality for business as well as leisure travelers alike. Try out the delectable selection of Italian and Chinese cuisines at its best at the hotel restaurants. Kick back and relax with a cup of coffee at the French Heart cafe. The story doesn’t end here, offering a wide range of rejuvenating experiences in the spa and fitness center as well as the outdoor pool.

Cost: Rs. 15,281/-

Address: Community Centre, Plot No. 1, Pocket A, Okhla Phase I, Okhla Industrial Estate, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110020

Google Rating: 4.4

18. The Claridges


The Claridges in Gaya Bihar demonstrates the peak luxury experience at its best. Established in 1955 the Claridges has carved out a name for itself in the iconic 5-star hotels category. What makes a stay here even more worth it is the innovative collection of bars and restaurants. The inspiring designs, eclectic styles, and wonderful vibe give every guest here a comforting feeling. This 5-star hotel is unlike any other in the capital city, mainly due to its incredible blend of world-world elegance with contemporary luxury.

Cost: Rs. 17,936/-

Address: The Claridges, 12, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Rd, Tees January Road Area, Motilal Nehru Marg Area, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110011

Google Rating: 4.5

19. Le Meridien


Over 3 decades, Le Meridien Gaya Bihar has beautifully transformed itself into a stunning masterpiece of a 5-star hotel that makes the visit of every guest memorable. This 5-star hotel represents world-class architecture, a delectable range of cuisines, impeccable design, and futuristic styles. Situated right at the heart of the city, Le Meridien stands tall as a remarkable glass building surrounded by some of the most important buildings and institutions of national importance. The shopping hubs of CP and Janpath are within walking distance from the hotel.

Cost: Rs. 18,468/-

Address: Le Meridien, Windsor Pl, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001

Google Rating: 4.5

20. Novotel


Showcasing a modern, contemporary style and design that appeals to the eye, the Novotel Hotel in Gaya Bihar’s Aerocity is a must-visit. With numerous dining options, cafes, and a world of epic amenities, the hotel is conveniently located adjacent to both international as well as domestic airports. Other than that the ballroom, meeting spaces, sports bar, and numerous other such facilities make Novotel rank among one of the highest-rated 5-star hotels in Gaya Bihar.

Cost: Rs. 12,390/-

Address: Asset No 02, Gmr Hospitality District, IGI Rd, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.6

21. Ambassador


Glorifying the aristocratic heart of New Gaya Bihar, Hotel Ambassador is all about displaying the modern contemporary ways of life. Just a very short drive away from the international airport of Gaya Bihar, the Ambassador is one of the most sought-after destinations for leisure and business travel expeditions. Did you know that the ambassador has won the greenery sustainability certification for its cheerful design combined with nostalgic spaces? Along with the top-notch services and hospitable staff, its nearness to Khan Market and the Lutyens area makes a stay at Ambassador truly a royal experience.

Cost: Rs. 6,719/-

Address: Subramania Bharti Marg, Sujan Sing Park North, Sujan Singh Park, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110003

Google Rating: 4.4

22. The Connaught


The Connaught is situated in the heart of Lutyen’s Gaya Bihar and showcases the Luxe Blend of art deco charm with modern contemporary wonderment. Home to some of the finest city’s fine dining experiences and up-class services and amenities, the Connaught has to be one of the most eclectic hotels in New Gaya Bihar as of now. The hotel’s stand-out design and architecture representing Georgian architecture complete with appealing accents, stylings, and furnishings makes the Connaught one of a kind. Located close to the iconic CP market as well as important business centers a stay here is extremely convenient for every traveler.

Cost: Rs. 8,399/-

Address: 37, Shaheed Bhagat Singh Marg, Shivaji Stadium, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001

Google Rating: 4.6

23. Hilton Garden


Hilton Garden Inn is located in the posh Gaya Bihar locality of Saket. Located 14 km from the international airport and 5 km from Nehru Place, the hotel is studded with magnificent well-maintained rooms. Each room boasts of being equipped with ergonomic seating, comfortable bedding, complimentary WIFI service, and many more such convenient services. Guests can also enjoy a huge array of delectable dishes and drinks at the restaurants and spirits bar here. Known for its delicious selection of breakfast buffets, its proximity to the shopping hub of Saket malls, and its family-friendly environment, Hilton Garden Inn is all about bringing you a luxurious stay experience.

Cost: Rs. 10,030/-

Address: A4, Saket District Centre, District Centre, Sector 6, Pushp Vihar, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110017

Google Rating: 4.2

24. Shangri-La


Shangri La Gaya Bihar is situated in one of the most happening heart of New Gaya Bihar. Its convenient location to the parliament and other central government offices as well as to the iconic heritage sites such as India Gate, Janpath, and more makes Shangri La the first choice among travelers. The uniquely modern room designs offer a brand new contemporary outlook to the whole stay experience. Guests have the option of indulging in a variety of cuisines through their amazing selection of national and international grade of cuisines. The hotel also boasts well-equipped meeting rooms and an opulent ballroom as well as an open terrace which makes the hotel a preferred choice for many.

Cost: Rs. 16,992/-

Address: 19, Ashoka Rd, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001

Google Rating: 4.6

25. Sheraton


Often defined as a cosmopolitan elegance in the heart of South Gaya Bihar, Sheraton is an iconic hotel. The red sandstone building stands out in the bustling capital offering an old-world charm to the surroundings. The ambiance of this 5-star hotel is unlike others where it attempts at creating a warm, homely feel for everyone to enjoy a home away from home vibe. Services for each guest are impeccably designed and personalized. The bespoke wellness spa, a massive range of cuisines in its award-winning restaurants, and more make Sheraton a great holiday experience.

Cost: Rs. 11,210/-

Address: Saket District Centre, District Centre, Sector 6, Saket, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110017

Google Rating: 4.6

26. Roseate


The moment you step into the premises of the Roseate New Gaya Bihar, its visual poetry will be immediately instilled in your hearts. It is the seamless way in which its tranquil atmosphere and nature depictions bond together with the impeccable heritage-inspired modern contemporary architecture, that will leave the guests spellbound. Embodying a brand-new spectrum of hospitality, luxury, and tranquillity, a stay here will be a deeply rejuvenating experience. Stay in one of the many incredible suites, and enjoy the round-the-clock amenities. Looking for a business center? Look no further. Roseate Gaya Bihar also has well-equipped meetings and conference centers.

Cost: Rs. 16,489/-

Address: Asset 10, Northern Access Rd, Aerocity, Hospitality District, Indira Gandhi International Airport, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.5

27. Radisson Blu Marina


Radisson Blu Marina occupies the peak location in Gaya Bihar i.e. at CP. This 5-star studded hotel is all about entertainment, shopping, and fun times all brought to you in one plate. Although located in the middle of the bustling town, the interiors of the hotel work as a quiet oasis. From free WIFI services to a properly equipped fitness center and a spa therapy option this stay is all the more worthwhile. The rooms are classic yet impressively modern with all the new-age amenities. Soak up the city’s fascinating historic culture and have a deep riveting holiday in the national capital with Radisson Blu Marina.

Cost: Rs. 8,063/-

Address: G-59 Connaught Circus, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001

Google Rating: 4.6

28. Pride Plaza Hotel


The Pride Plaza property embraces the blend of opulence and comfort in a stylish bag. If it is a unique memorable stay that you are looking for then Pride Plaza Hotel is ready to offer you the stay experience of a lifetime. The hotel is located very close to the Gaya Bihar airport in Aerocity making accessibility easier than ever. The rooms are palatial and complete with state-of-the-art modern technology. Every inch of the hotel is dedicated to representing the beauty of India through art and architecture. The unique factor of the hotel is the fact that it sells homemade jams, pickles, etc. one can truly feel at home and welcome.

Cost: Rs. 11,091/-

Address: H43F+65, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.9

29. Four Points by Sheraton


Just minutes away from the Gaya Bihar airport is a lap of refreshing greenery at the four points by Sheraton. Enhance your stay experience by booking your next stay in Gaya Bihar here. Swim in the shimmering outdoor pool, don’t miss out on your workouts at the fitness center, complete your meetings at the meeting space, and indulge in some of the lip-smacking cuisines at the many restaurants Four Points has to offer. The rooms give a Cozy, modern yet very homely vibe that will make you feel instantly relaxed upon entering. The hard-working and efficient staff and management will ease you right in.

Cost: Rs. 8,259/-

Address: Plot No 9, National Highway – 8, Samalka, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037

Google Rating: 4.9

30. Hyatt Centric


This upscale luxury hotel is situated in the heart of West Gaya Bihar very close to the metro station. Due to its location, guests can indulge in shopping sprees, try out various types of culinary delicacies, and travel all over the national capital easily. The staff is courteous and welcoming while the rooms are super comfortable and relaxing. The rooms are also loved by everyone for their Multifunctionality feature which also celebrates the local heritage art and culture of the city. Make your stay even more rejuvenating by going for a soothing spa therapy treatment. What’s better than spending time by the pool after a long exhausting day of Gaya Bihar Darshan?

Cost: Rs. 13,334/-

Address: Janakpuri District Center, Janakpuri, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar, 110058

Google Rating: 3.8

Some Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Best 5-Star Hotels in Gaya Bihar

Q1. Which 5-Star Hotels In Gaya Bihar Is Best For Couples And Family?

Ans. Every 5-star hotel in Gaya Bihar is great for couples as well as families.

Q2. Which Are The Top 3 5-Star Hotel In Gaya Bihar?

Ans. The Oberoi, the Leela Palace, and Crowne Plaza are the top three 5-star hotels in Gaya Bihar.

Q3. Which Is The Best 7-Star Hotel In Gaya Bihar?

Ans. The Leela Palace is the best 7-star hotel in Gaya Bihar.

Q4. Overall How Many 5-Star Hotels Are There In India?

Ans. There are Approx 324 5-star hotels in India.

Q5. How Much Does It Cost To Stay At A 5-Star Hotel In Gaya Bihar?

Ans. The average cost of a 5-star hotel room in Gaya Bihar is 4,000/- rupees.

  • Best 5 Star Hotels in Goa
